author: Anonymous Calc
title: clarification on course
question: I just wanted to confirm that the rule to pass the course was that our overall course grade must be higher than the average of the 2nd midterm and final exam right?
student_answer:
You must pass the combined average of midterm 2 and the final exam (MT2 + FE / 2 >= 50%) to pass the course. Any student who fails the combined average of these two exams will receive a grade of no higher than 45% for the course
http://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/syllabus.html
